reviewText: Quality baseball instruction will help first year coaches. I found there was a little too much talk and not enough drills. This reviewer also recommends these popular baseball products. Schupak's Baseball Super 8 DVD Set Youth Baseball Drills

Coach Tom Emanski is one of the finest professional recruiters of major league baseball talent.  His experience spans a period of over 25 years and as Operations Director of Baseball World in Orlando, FL, he has assembled one of the finest sets of instructional videos for coaches and players of all levels (youth league to college).

This series is a MUST HAVE if you are even considering whether to coach baseball at the youth league or high school levels.  And even if you are a seasoned athletics coach, if you weren't trained at Baseball World or by former affiliates with major league or minor league baseball, you should buy this video!
